LanguageData.NHE.label: Nuke
LanguageData.NHE.description: This type has a greater damaging effect and radiation contamination. Increased damage is achieved at the cost of reduced range, which can turn out badly for a lightly protected shooter.
LanguageData.THE.label: Nuke, with a set time
LanguageData.THE.description: Has a 5-second timer. Does not detonate on impact with other objects, allowing it to ricochet off walls and around corners. A projectile that directly hits an enemy also deals damage, in addition to the subsequent explosion..
